entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
